# Interactive graph

<style>
  * {
    font-family: sans-serif;
  }

<div id="plot">
</div>

<p>The plot shows the overall tobacco trends from 2012 to 2018, collected by <a href="https://www.lung.org/research/trends-in-lung-disease/tobacco-trends-brief/overall-tobacco-trends">American Lung Association</a>. Click 'Add bar' to add additional trend for next year, generated by picking two random tobacco trends from past records, in order, and add the change in trend to the latest record. Notice that the value is decreasing and could reach zero. Click 'Remove bar' to remove the latest bar and generate new ones.</p>

<button type="button" onclick="add()">Add bar</button>
<button type="button" onclick="remove()">Remove bar</button>
